H0.text: Which motorway links Coventry to Leicester. M1

H1.text: Which motorway links Coventry to Leicester. M6

H2.text: Which motorway links Coventry to Leicester. M42

H3.text: Which motorway links Coventry to Leicester. M69

A4.text: The M69 runs between junction 21 of the M1 near Leicester and junction 2 of the M6 near Coventry.

A5.text: The motorway, also known at the time as the 'Coventry â€“ Leicester Motorway' was completed in 1977.
